price: 谁服从使者，谁确已服从安拉；谁违背〔使者，你不要管谁〕，因为我没有派你做他们的监护者。
arabic: مَّن يُطِعِ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَقَدۡ أَطَاعَ ٱللَّهَۖ وَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ فَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: man yuṭiʿi al-rasūla faqad aṭāʿa al-laha waman tawallā famā arsalnāka ʿalayhim ḥafīẓan
